sections.heading: interest; subject to claims of creditors
sections.text: The subjection to the claims of creditors of a future interest, whether legal or equitable, is not prevented or avoided on the sole ground that such interest is future or contingent.SourceLaws 1941, c. 153, ยง 8, p. 596;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 76-1008;R.S.1943, ยง 76
